short_summary: Purchase and install a manual milling machine for DND
description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has the requirement to purchase and install a manual milling machine to restore manual cutting operations for simple and complex aircraft parts.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Manual Milling Machine Procurement

**Tender Details**
---------------

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4170203299-Doc4498373047 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4170203299 |
| Publication Date | 2024-04-25 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-06-21T14:00:00 (expired) |
| Amendment Number | 2 |

**Procurement Details**
---------------------

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |
| Trade Agreements | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |

**Project Scope**
----------------

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires the purchase and installation of a manual milling machine to restore manual cutting operations for simple and complex aircraft parts.

**Contracting Details**
---------------------

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity Name | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| Contracting Entity Address | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada |
| Contracting Entity Contact | Angela Nakade, SPAC/PSPC (she/her), email: angela.nakade@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca|

**Access the Tender**
---------------------

The tender can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19509315?extsite=MTk1MDkzMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19509315?extsite=MTk1MDkzMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). [^1]

---

I assume that you have read the `constraints.md` which outlines the rules and regulations for government tenders in Canada.[^2] In keeping with this document's requirements, the tender for the manual milling machine has been formatted in a clear and concise manner to facilitate easy reading and understanding by all stakeholders.

 I have tried to translate  'aucune raison limitative' as 'None', but it could also be translated to 'Limit None' or 'No Limitations'. It seems like it could be translated to either
